description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen for displaying assigned deliveries in a delivery app. It includes route handling, permission checks, and UI components like headers and list items, utilizing custom themes and responsiveness.

classes.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the assigned deliveries screen in the delivery module, handling role-based access and displaying placeholders or content accordingly.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying the header section with theme-based decoration and an icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A reusable stateless widget representing an item in the list, with an icon and customizable text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each class, including permission checks, app bar, and placeholder content.
